summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. Initially, a white sedan is seen on the left side of the road. As the vehicle progresses, a red tricycle appears ahead, moving slowly and eventually stopping on the right side of the road.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while approaching the red tricycle. The vehicles speed remains steady as it navigates the rural road, keeping a safe distance from the tricycle ahead.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, parked and not moving. 2) Front: A red tricycle, approximately 5 meters away, moving slowly and eventually stopping on the right side of the road.
